Heading: Date
Meaning: Day of Month

Heading: Location
Meaning: City in Austrailia

Heading: MinTemp
Meaning: Minimum temperature in the 24 hours to 9am Sometimes only known to the nearest whole degree

Heading: MaxTemp
Meaning: Maximum temperaure in the 24 hours from 9am Sometimes only known to the nearest whole degree

Heading: Rainfall
Meaning: Precipitation (rainfall) in the 24 hours to 9am Sometimes only known to the nearest whole millimetre

Heading: Evaporation
Meaning: Class A pan evaporation in the 24 hours to 9am

Heading: Sunshine
Meaning: Bright sunshine in the 24 hours to midnight

Heading: WindGustDir
Meaning: Direction of strongest gust in the 24 hours to midnight

Heading: WindGustSpeed
Meaning: Speed of strongest wind gust in the 24 hours to midnight

Heading: Temp9am
Meaning: Temperature at 9am

Heading: Humidity9am
Meaning: Relative humidity at 9am

Heading: Cloud9am
Meaning: Fraction of sky obscured by cloud at 9am

Heading: WindDir9am
Meaning: Wind direction averaged over 10 minutes prior to 9am

Heading: WindSpeed9am
Meaning: Wind speed averaged over 10 minutes prior to 9am

Heading: Pressure9am
Meaning: Atmospheric pressure reduced to mean sea level at 9am

Heading: Temp3pm
Meaning: Temperature at 3pm

Heading: Humidity3pm
Meaning: Relative humidity at 3pm

Heading: Cloud3pm
Meaning: Fraction of sky obscured by cloud at 3pm

Heading: WindDir3pm
Meaning: Wind direction averaged over 10 minutes prior to 3pm

Heading: WindSpeed3pm
Meaning: Wind speed averaged over 10 minutes prior to 3pm

Heading: Pressure3pm
Meaning: Atmospheric pressure reduced to mean sea level at 3pm

Heading: RainToday
Meaning: Yes if the rain for today is 1mm or more, No if otherwise

Heading: RainTomorrow
Meaning: Yes if the rain for tomorrow is 1mm or more, No if otherwise  (target variable to predict )
